description:
Welcome back to Inside Tabletop. In this series I talk to people that live and work in Gaming, getting them to share their insights on the business of game entertainment. 

Today I'm sitting down with series-favourite Chris from Lords of War Games and Hobbies as we discuss what I see as an emerging problem with Introductory Products (read; Starter Sets) in 2024. 

If you're a Patron; this episode is also available as an exclusive audio Podcast today as well that you'll have already heard three days early!

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathrayd
title: Inside Tabletop   -  Let's talk about the growing problem with Starter Sets...
